mapper.select: SELECT EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.SEARCH_SEQ AS searchSeq /* 검색어 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.SEARCH AS search /* 검색어, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.SEARCH_DD AS searchDd /* 검색 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.REAL_VIEW_CNT AS realViewCnt /* 실제 조회수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.MNG_VIEW_CNT AS mngViewCnt /* 관리 조회수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_POPUL_SEARCH /* 인기 검색어 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.SEARCH_SEQ = #{searchSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 검색어 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_POPUL_SEARCH /* 인기 검색어 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_POPUL_SEARCH.SEARCH_SEQ = #{searchSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 검색어 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_POPUL_SEARCH SET /* 인기 검색어 */ SEARCH = #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 검색어, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,SEARCH_DD = #{searchDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 검색 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,REAL_VIEW_CNT = #{realViewCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 실제 조회수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MNG_VIEW_CNT = #{mngViewCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 관리 조회수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND SEARCH_SEQ = #{searchSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 검색어 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_POPUL_SEARCH /* 인기 검색어 */ WHERE 1=1 AND SEARCH_SEQ = #{searchSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 검색어 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
